response.overview: K.M.Lo , tech-nomad, filmmaker, trainer, starts an ONE-MAN-MISSION, he uses a Tuk Tuk (tricycle) as platform/symbol to run a mobile film school by day and open air cinema by night, to train young folks in developing world to get film education, a sense of achievement and organizing self-generated entertainment and cinema art as cultural events. He wishes to spread happiness to the community and it might eventually change the world.
response.title: Tuk Tuk Cinema
